cause.description:
Consumerism and materialism is a global disease which is spread mainly through dangerously powerful advertising media and corporations. Not only does consumerism brainwash people into erroneously believing that the purchase of a status-enhancing product equals happiness, but it also destroys the environment due to pollution, excessive use of the natural but limited resources like gas, oil, wood, etc.
1. The things you own, will end up owning you!
cause.mission: stop consumerism and materialism which sedates people into believing that happiness and fulfillment can be achieved by buying things you don't really need!
cause.name: Project MAYHEM!
